issue.message: Don't include `android.R` here; use a fully qualified name for each usage instead
The vertically scrolling `ScrollView` should not contain another vertically scrolling widget (`ScrollView`)
Replace the <fragment> tag with FragmentContainerView.

The intent action `android.intent.action.MAIN (used to start an activity)` matches the intent filter of a non-exported component `com.razorpay.CheckoutActivity` from a manifest. If you are trying to invoke this specific component via the action then you should make the intent explicit by calling `Intent.set{Component,Class,ClassName}`.
